VIII OF 1953 [15th April, 1953] An Act to make certain provisions regarding accommodation, whether residential or non-residential furnished or unfurnished, in the 2[Karachi Division]. WHEREAS it is expedient to make certain provisions regarding accommodation, whether residential or non-residential, furnished or unfurnished, in the 2[Karachi Division], and in particular to provide for controlling the rents chargeable for such accommodation and for preventing eviction in certain cases ; It is hereby enacted as follows: 1. Short title, extent and commencement. (1) This Act may be called the Karachi Rent Restriction Act, 1953. (2) It extends to the 2[Karachi Division]. (3) It shall come into Force at once. 2.
